# Brainstorming Ideas - Gemini

## Idea 1: Real-time Collaboration
Enable multiple users to edit documents simultaneously with conflict resolution.

**Key Features**:
- Operational Transformation (OT) algorithm
- WebSocket-based sync
- Cursor tracking

## Idea 2: AI-Powered Suggestions
Integrate GPT for smart content recommendations.

**Key Features**:
- Context-aware suggestions
- Multi-language support
- Privacy-first design

## Idea 3: Offline-First Architecture
Support full functionality without internet connection.

**Key Features**:
- Local-first sync
- Conflict-free replicated data types (CRDTs)
- Background sync when online
